name: Puffsqueak
description: A tiny but incredibly strong squirrel fairy with fluffy tail and determination. Despite its adorable appearance, it packs powerful punches and can learn fighting techniques.

ability.name: Scrappy Fighter
ability.description: Physical moves gain 30% power boost. Fighting-type moves are super effective against Fairy types.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: A quick tackle that always goes first.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.description: Breaks through barriers and deals fighting damage. Can shatter screens.

moves.name: Tail Slap
moves.description: Slaps the target 2-5 times with its fluffy tail.

moves.name: Play Rough
moves.description: Plays rough with the target. May lower the target's attack.
